attributes.action: save the effected Post Offices of Barnard Castle, Bishop Auckland, Darlington, Hartlepool, Middlesbrough, Redcar, Saltburn, Shildon, Spennymoor and Richmond from closure by the Royal Mail.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Royal Mail plans to close 37 Post Office branches in the Tees Valley and North Yorkshire as part of a nationwide money saving review of the network. Many people will be adversely effected including the elderly, the disabled, those facing financial hardship and those without a bank account. Please show your support for your local Post Office branch by signing this petition by 26 March 2008.
